about_the_game:
When looking for changes in your life, you use the services of an employment agency. Fate throws you to another country, where you are employed in an inn in the middle of nowhere. You quickly learn how to cope with new responsibilities, and at the same time you get to know the other, beautiful part of the staff better.

As you manage your time between shifts, you develop a very intimate relationship with your co-workers. Trying to avoid the eyes of hotel guests, you use every corner and every piece of furniture to satisfy the desires of the two, three and four of you...



The demo version lets you play the first three days of the main character's adventures. During them, you can experience all the main features that make up the full version of "Komadori Inn".

See what working in the inn is like, receive your first quests and experience moments of romantic ecstasy while getting to know your new co-workers better.

Note: the demo ends on day 3, regardless of whether you manage to complete all the content or not.







- Take control over animated sex scenes with sounds and voices
- Raise your stats, unlock new perks and sex positions
- Work at the inn by playing relaxing minigames
- Manage your time, energy and sperm between fun and responsibilities
- Develop relationships with Dating Sim mechanics
- Take part in many stories and little adventures

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages - as strong language and depictions of consensual sexual acts. All characters are at least 18 years old. Pictures consist of full nudity and sex in various positions. Alcohol occurs while working at the bar (it is served to clients).

name: Komadori Inn Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium IV 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000

Sexuelle Inhalte
Alkohol / Tabak
Derbe Sprache

short_description: Your boring life changed, when you started to work at the Komadori Inn. A picturesque forest by the sea and beautiful co-workers make the perfect place for relaxing. Manage your time, energy and sperm while you choose between responsibilities and fun in our Dating Sim Adventure.
supported_languages: English, French, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Thai, Spanish - Spain
